name: CKShare.ParticipantPermission
desc: Constants that represent the permissions to grant to a share participant.

items.name: case none
items.desc: The participant doesn’t have any permissions for the share.

items.name: case readOnly
items.desc: The participant has read-only permissions for the share.

items.name: case readWrite
items.desc: The participant has read-and-write permissions for the share.
